title: Casual App Positive Male Voice Announcer
description: 809 energetic male voice announcer phrases for casual and mobile games, such as puzzles, match, quest, board games, educational, cards, casino, sports and more.
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Audio Preview | List of Phrases


This pack is part of our Casual App Announcer Bundle & Ultimate Announcers Bundle!


This energetic and positive male announcer voice pack covers everything you need for your next project.

It can be used for games such as: puzzles, matching, quests, board games, educational, casino, sports, card games and more.

It can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 809 files, almost all are unique phrases.
  • The pack is divided into categories for easy access.
  • Top-quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


CATEGORIES:


  • Confirmation
  • Refuse
  • Greetings
  • Farewell
  • Thanks
  • Instructions
  • Round-Level
  • Start Level
  • End Level
  • Win
  • Lose
  • Positive Feedback
  • Negative Feedback
  • Time-Countdown
  • Selection
  • Warning
  • Questions
  • Elements
  • Direction
  • Casual App
  • Sports
  • Casino
